plugins.name: Transparency Fade
plugins.description:
Transparency Fade empowers designers to effortlessly apply gradient transparency to any image within Figma. Whether you're aiming for smooth fades, overlay effects, or subtle visual transitions, this plugin provides an intuitive interface to achieve professional results without the need for external tools.


Key Features:

  1. Apply linear or radial gradient transparency to images.
  2. Adjust gradient direction, opacity stops, and intensity with ease.
  3. Real-time preview to fine-tune effects seamlessly.
  4. No need for external editing software—everything is handled within Figma
plugins.tagline: Seamless Gradient Transparency for Your Images

plugins.name: GUI Automation
plugins.description:
This plugin checks your mockup against GUI Automation conventions so the best possible angular project can be generated.


Currently following errors and warnings are supported and recognized:

Naming Convention Error:

For recognizing the correct components they need to be named correctly.

-> Valid Names: 'button', 'checkbox', 'dropdown', 'header', 'image', 'label', 'row', 'select', 'slider', 'tab', 'text field', 'text-field'


Missing Component Error:

Groups of shapes and text should be summarized as a component.


No Auto Layout Warning:

Using auto layout in frames helps produce better placement and overall looks in the generated angular project .
plugins.tagline: This plugin checks your mockup against GUI Automation conventions

plugins.name: ThumbOrg
plugins.description:
ThumbOrg is an intuitive and robust Figma plugin designed to streamline your design process and improve your productivity. It takes the hassle out of manually creating thumbnails for your Figma files and offers a systematic approach to organizing your pages.


Key Features:

  1. Automatic Thumbnail Creation: The plugin auto-generates thumbnails for your Figma files, giving you a visual overview of your designs. Say goodbye to confusion and easily identify each of your files at a glance.
  2. Efficient Page Organization: ThumbOrg allows you to arrange your Figma pages in a clean, logical manner, ensuring a smooth design flow. Maintain a coherent structure for easy navigation and improved understanding of your design system.
  3. User-Friendly Interface: With a simple and intuitive UI, ThumbOrg is a breeze to use. It seamlessly integrates into your Figma workspace, becoming an essential part of your design toolkit.


Experience a new level of convenience and efficiency in your Figma design process with ThumbOrg. It's time to simplify, organize, and visualize your designs like never before.
plugins.tagline: Visual Harmony in Your Design Workflow.

plugins.name: Typography Style Guide Creator
plugins.description:
Typography Style Guide Creator is a powerful Figma plugin that helps designers streamline their typography workflow by automatically generating text styles from existing designs. Stop manually recreating text styles and let this plugin do the heavy lifting.

With Typography Style Guide Creator, you can transform any frame containing text elements into a complete typography system that's integrated directly into your Figma styles. Simply select a frame with your text designs, run the plugin, and watch as your typography system comes to life.

Key Features


Instant Style Generation: Convert manually created text elements into reusable Figma text styles with one click

Smart Name Recognition: Uses your text layer names as style names for better organization

Duplicate Detection: Intelligently identifies and merges duplicate styles to keep your design system clean

Visual Style Preview: See all created styles in an intuitive interface before applying them

Seamless Integration: Styles are added directly to your Figma document's style library


How It Works


Select a Frame: Choose any frame containing your text elements

Name Your Layers: Ensure text layers have descriptive names (e.g., "Heading/H1", "Body/Regular")

Run the Plugin: Click "Create Styles" to generate your typography system

Done!: Your text styles are now available in your Figma document


Perfect For


Design teams establishing consistent typography systems

Designers converting existing designs into organized style guides

Design system maintainers looking to formalize typography rules

Anyone who wants to save time on manual style creation


Save Hours of Design Work

Typography Style Guide Creator eliminates the tedious process of manually creating and managing text styles. What would normally take hours can now be done in seconds, allowing you to focus on what matters most—designing great experiences.
plugins.tagline: Turn your text designs into organized typography styles with a single click

plugins.name: AI Font Pairing
plugins.description:
Font pairing is one of the hardest feats of typography and good visual design. I still remember when I made posters (and still do) for a graphic design class, how bad pairings can easily make or break things.


So, I built a plugin where you can get an analysis and score for your font pairing with some suggestions.
plugins.tagline: An AI plugin where you can get an analysis and score for your font pairing with suggestions.

plugins.name: Guideflow - AI-Powered Interactive Demos & Guides
plugins.description:
Guideflow Figma Plugin: Transform Your Figma Designs into Interactive Demos and Guides with Ease


The Guideflow Figma plugin empowers designers and non-designers alike to quickly turn Figma frames into interactive demos, step-by-step guides, GIFs, and videos. Whether you’re working in product, marketing, customer success, or design, Guideflow makes it simple to create engaging, dynamic presentations from your Figma designs, without needing any coding skills.


Why use Guideflow?

Guideflow takes your Figma frames and brings them to life, providing a seamless transition from static design to interactive experience. Whether you're preparing a product demo, creating user guides, or showcasing design concepts, Guideflow allows you to elevate your communication by transforming designs into fully functional, trackable walkthroughs and videos.


Key Benefits:


Instant Interactive Demos

Export your Figma frames directly to Guideflow, where you can build interactive demos in minutes. Whether for a product demo or a UX flow, Guideflow allows you to visually guide users through the design, providing them with a hands-on experience.


Step-by-Step Walkthroughs

Create detailed walkthroughs for any use case, including user onboarding, tutorials, and internal training. Each step can be annotated with helpful instructions, animated elements, and dynamic transitions, guiding viewers through the process effortlessly.


Flexible Output Options

Choose how you want to share your interactive demos or guides. With Guideflow, you can generate interactive web demos, export GIFs, or create polished videos from your Figma frames. Whether you need a live interactive demo or a shareable video presentation, Guideflow has you covered.


Enhanced Collaboration & Feedback

Empower your entire team to participate in the design process. Guideflow allows designers, marketers, and product managers to collaborate seamlessly, sharing interactive demos or guides for feedback, validation, or user testing. Real-time sharing and engagement tracking ensure that your team and stakeholders are always on the same page.


No Code Required

Anyone can create with Guideflow, even without design or coding expertise. Simply select the frames from Figma, export to Guideflow, and start adding interactivity like animated hotspots, transitions, and voiceovers—all without needing a single line of code.


Features that Set Guideflow Apart:

Customizable Elements: Add voiceovers, branching paths, embedded forms, and animated annotations to personalize your demo or guide.


Real-Time Engagement Tracking: See who’s interacting with your demos, track viewer engagement, and identify drop-off points to improve your content.


Multiple Sharing Options: Share your interactive demo as a personalized link, embed it directly into websites or documents, or export it as an MP4 or GIF for easy distribution.


How to Get Started:


  1. Select Your Figma Frames: Choose the specific frames or series of frames from your Figma project that you want to bring into Guideflow.
  2. Export to Guideflow: With the click of a button, your selected frames are transferred to Guideflow, where you can begin to enhance them with interactivity, guidance, and customization.
  3. Add Interactive Elements: Use Guideflow’s intuitive interface to add animations, transitions, voiceovers, or text annotations. Highlight key actions and guide your audience through each step.
  4. Share & Track Engagement: Once your demo or guide is complete, share it with your team or users via a link, embed it in web pages, or export it as a video or GIF. Monitor engagement and get insights into user interactions.


Use Cases:

  1. Product Demos: Perfect for showcasing new features or flows to clients and stakeholders.
  2. User Onboarding: Build step-by-step guides to help new users get up to speed quickly and efficiently.
  3. Design Feedback: Share interactive designs with your team for feedback, reviews, or testing, ensuring everyone is aligned on the final vision.
  4. Marketing Presentations: Export stunning, animated GIFs or videos from your Figma designs to support marketing campaigns, social media, or pitches.


With the Guideflow Figma plugin, turning your designs into interactive, shareable experiences is faster and easier than ever. Whether you're creating for internal teams or external audiences, Guideflow offers the flexibility and power you need to communicate your ideas effectively.
plugins.tagline: Create interactive demos & guides from Figma

In the past, our design scattered texts across different layers, requiring multiple clicks to edit them.


Now, we've centralized all texts in one place, making them editable with just a simple selection.

Moreover, it boasts powerful features such as search, find and replace, and creating numbered lists.

plugins.name: Variables2Sheets
plugins.description:
🇺🇸 English Description (🇰🇷 한국어 설명은 아래에 있습니다.)

Variables2Sheets - Complete Figma Variables Management Solution 🌟

Transform your Figma workflow with Variables2Sheets, the comprehensive plugin for managing design variables through spreadsheets. From simple exports to complete design system maintenance, streamline your variable management process with powerful features designed for modern design teams.


✨ What's New - Major Update

Now supporting ALL Figma variable types with enhanced functionality:


🎯 Complete Variable Type Support

  1. String - Text content and multi-language management
  2. Color - Color system and palette management
  3. Number - Spacing, sizing, and numeric values
  4. Boolean - State management (true/false)


🔗 Alias Support

  1. String, Color, Number, Boolean Alias fully supported
  2. Manage complex variable reference relationships effortlessly
  3. Advanced feature for actual value resolution


🔄 Advanced Collection Management

  1. Move variables between collections directly from spreadsheets
  2. Auto-create new collections when needed
  3. Reorganize your design system structure effortlessly


🌐 Multi-Language Interface

  1. Korean language support for local teams
  2. Perfect for global design teams and CMS workflows
  3. Additional languages coming soon


🎨 Enhanced User Experience

  1. System theme support (Dark/Light mode)
  2. Auto-refresh collections
  3. Streamlined interface for better productivity


🚀 Key Features

  1. Export to CSV/JSON formats
  2. Import edited variables back to Figma
  3. Copy variables directly to clipboard for Google Sheets
  4. Choose specific collections to export
  5. Seamless cross-project variable management


User Guide: https://nine0109.github.io/note/Public/2025-05-25_variables2sheets_guide


Perfect for design system managers, content teams, and anyone working with complex variable structures in Figma. Experience the evolution from a simple export tool to a complete variables management solution.


----------------


🇰🇷 한국어 설명

Variables2Sheets - 완벽한 Figma Variables 관리 솔루션 🌟

Figma Variables를 스프레드시트로 관리하는 완전한 솔루션입니다. 단순한 내보내기부터 복잡한 디자인 시스템 관리까지, 현대적인 디자인 팀을 위한 강력한 기능을 제공합니다.


✨ 주요 업데이트

모든 Figma Variable 타입을 지원하는 향상된 기능:


🎯 완벽한 Variable 타입 지원

  1. String - 텍스트 콘텐츠 및 다국어 관리
  2. Color - 컬러 시스템 및 팔레트 관리
  3. Number - 간격, 크기 및 숫자 값
  4. Boolean - 상태 관리 (true/false)


🔗 별칭(Alias) 지원

  1. String, Color, Number, Boolean Alias 지원
  2. 복잡한 Variable 참조 관계도 손쉽게 관리
  3. 고급 기능을 사용한 실제 값 변환 표시


🔄 고급 컬렉션 관리

  1. 스프레드시트에서 컬렉션 간 Variables 이동
  2. 필요시 새 컬렉션 자동 생성
  3. 디자인 시스템 구조를 손쉽게 재정리


🌐 다국어 인터페이스

  1. 한국어 지원으로 로컬 팀 친화적
  2. 글로벌 디자인 팀과 CMS 워크플로우에 최적
  3. 추가 언어 지원 예정


🎨 향상된 사용자 경험

  1. 시스템 테마 지원 (다크/라이트 모드)
  2. 컬렉션 자동 새로고침
  3. 생산성을 위한 간소화된 인터페이스


🚀 핵심 기능

  1. CSV/JSON 형식으로 내보내기
  2. 편집된 Variables를 Figma로 다시 가져오기
  3. 클립보드로 직접 복사하여 Google Sheets에 붙여넣기
  4. 특정 컬렉션 선택 내보내기
  5. 프로젝트 간 Variable 관리


사용법 가이드: https://nine0109.github.io/note/Public/2025-05-25_variables2sheets_guide

디자인 시스템 관리자, 콘텐츠 팀, 복잡한 Variable 구조를 다루는 모든 분들에게 완벽한 솔루션입니다.

Figma Variables를 스프레드시트로 관리하는 완전한 솔루션입니다. 단순한 내보내기부터 복잡한 디자인 시스템 관리까지, 현대적인 디자인 팀을 위한 강력한 기능을 제공합니다.


✨ 주요 업데이트

모든 Figma Variable 타입을 지원하는 향상된 기능:


🎯 완벽한 Variable 타입 지원

  1. String - 텍스트 콘텐츠 및 다국어 관리
  2. Color - 컬러 시스템 및 팔레트 관리
  3. Number - 간격, 크기 및 숫자 값
  4. Boolean - 상태 관리 (true/false)


🔗 별칭(Alias) 지원

  1. String, Color, Number, Boolean Alias 지원
  2. 복잡한 Variable 참조 관계도 손쉽게 관리
  3. 고급 기능을 사용한 실제 값 변환 표시


🔄 고급 컬렉션 관리

  1. 스프레드시트에서 컬렉션 간 Variables 이동
  2. 필요시 새 컬렉션 자동 생성
  3. 디자인 시스템 구조를 손쉽게 재정리


🌐 다국어 인터페이스

  1. 한국어 지원으로 로컬 팀 친화적
  2. 글로벌 디자인 팀과 CMS 워크플로우에 최적
  3. 추가 언어 지원 예정


🎨 향상된 사용자 경험

  1. 시스템 테마 지원 (다크/라이트 모드)
  2. 컬렉션 자동 새로고침
  3. 생산성을 위한 간소화된 인터페이스


🚀 핵심 기능

  1. CSV/JSON 형식으로 내보내기
  2. 편집된 Variables를 Figma로 다시 가져오기
  3. 클립보드로 직접 복사하여 Google Sheets에 붙여넣기
  4. 특정 컬렉션 선택 내보내기
  5. 프로젝트 간 Variable 관리

plugins.name: 图片导出助手 image Export Assistant
plugins.description:
Introduction

The Image Export Assistant is a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline and organize the process of exporting images for multiple platforms. Whether you're working on iOS, Android, or Web projects, this plugin ensures your assets are perfectly scaled and neatly categorized.


Function Description

  1. Preset Configurations: Choose from predefined presets for iOS, Android, or Web to automatically set up export scales, prefixes, and suffixes.
  2. Multiple Formats: Export your designs in various formats including PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, and WEBP.
  3. Organized Folder Structure: Utilize prefixes to automatically create folder structures within ZIP archives, ensuring your exports are well-organized.
  4. Customizable Export Options: Add, modify, or delete export configurations to suit your specific project needs.
  5. Efficient Workflow: Save time by managing all your export settings in one place, reducing repetitive tasks and minimizing errors.


How to Use

  1. Select Elements: Choose one or more elements in your Figma project that you wish to export.
  2. Run the Plugin: Navigate to Plugins > Image Export Assistant > Export.
  3. Choose Preset: Click on a preset button (iOS, Android, or Web) to automatically configure export settings, or manually adjust scales, prefixes, and suffixes as needed.
  4. Select Format: Choose your desired export format from the dropdown menu (PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, WEBP).
  5. Export: Click the Export button to generate and download a ZIP file containing your organized exports.


Notes

  1. Prefix Formatting: Ensure that prefixes end with a / to create proper folder structures within the ZIP archive.
  2. Browser Compatibility: Some formats like WEBP require browser support for Canvas toDataURL conversions.
  3. ZIP Archives: The plugin always generates a ZIP file, even for single exports, to maintain consistency and organization.
  4. Logging: Detailed logs are available in the developer console to help troubleshoot any issues during the export process.


介绍

图片导出助手是一款功能强大的Figma插件，旨在简化和组织多平台图像导出的过程。无论您是为iOS、Android还是Web项目工作，此插件都能确保您的资产完美缩放并整齐分类。


功能说明

  1. 预设配置： 选择iOS、Android或Web预设，自动设置导出倍数、前缀和后缀。
  2. 多种格式： 支持将设计导出为PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF和WEBP等多种格式。
  3. 有序的文件夹结构： 利用前缀自动在ZIP归档中创建文件夹结构，确保导出内容井然有序。
  4. 自定义导出选项： 添加、修改或删除导出配置，以满足您的特定项目需求。
  5. 高效工作流程： 在一个地方管理所有导出设置，节省时间，减少重复任务并降低错误率。


使用方法

  1. 选择元素： 在Figma项目中选择一个或多个您希望导出的元素。
  2. 运行插件： 导航至 Plugins > 图片导出助手 > Export。
  3. 选择预设： 点击预设按钮（iOS、Android或Web），自动配置导出设置，或根据需要手动调整倍数、前缀和后缀。
  4. 选择格式： 从下拉菜单中选择您需要的导出格式（PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF、WEBP）。
  5. 导出： 点击导出按钮，生成并下载包含您有序导出的ZIP文件。


注意事项

  1. 前缀格式： 确保前缀以/结尾，以在ZIP归档中创建正确的文件夹结构。
  2. 浏览器兼容性： 某些格式如WEBP需要浏览器支持Canvas的toDataURL转换。
  3. ZIP归档： 插件始终生成ZIP文件，即使是单个导出，以保持一致性和组织性。
  4. 日志记录： 开发者控制台中提供详细日志，帮助排查导出过程中的任何问题。

Effortlessly set and customize text line-height based on font size with flexible formulas—perfect for precise typography adjustments in Figma.

plugins.name: Apply Absolute Auto Layout
plugins.description:
Apply Absolute Auto Layout


Have you ever applied auto layout to an icon frame, only for it to resize the frame and reposition the vectors inside of it? Here is the solution to your auto layout woes!


This plugin applies the following to each selected frame:


  1. Set auto layout, center alignment on both axes, fixed width and height, and restore original frame dimensions
  2. For each immediate vector child layer, apply absolute positioning and restore original x/y coordinates within the parent frame


And that's it!


GitHub Repository: https://github.com/Saeris/apply-absolute-auto-layout
plugins.tagline: Apply autolayout to your icons without risk of resizing or elements repositioning!

plugins.name: Eternal Variable Export
plugins.description:
Export library variables, library styles, local variables and local styles to CSS variables and classes (for text and effect styles).


To export styles which are included in a library, you will need to go to the library file and copy the style keys from within the plugin, then go back to the file you are exporting from and paste the keys into the 'Include External Style Keys' input field. This is required because Figma does not make the styles accessibile within their APIs. Make sure your library has been published when exporting styles to ensure the output includes the changes.


Alternatively export as JSON and write your own scripts to convert into any style format you need.


Todo:

  • Make it clearer how to include external styles
  • Support additional export modes (e.g. scss)
  • Something missing? Get in touch
plugins.tagline: Export external library variables & styles, local variables & styles to css variables

plugins.name: Lines to frames
plugins.description:
This simple plugin converts text lines from a selected normal Figma text frame to regular frames of defined pixel size with or without text. Optionally generated frames can be wrapper to an auto layout. Frames are named according to the lines.


This is helpful for example when you have a list of file names and you know you want to create a frames for each with defined size.


I'm not aware of any limits regarding how many lines are supported or how big frames.
plugins.tagline: Converts lines from text frame to frames of any size with or without text.

plugins.name: Plus Also Studios for Figma
plugins.description:
Rollout

Sync your images and copy with your main component designs in Figma to rollout multiple sizes and variations of your creative. This plugin is great for generating static or multi frame ads with lightening speed.

Features include:

  1. Resize your designs based on your main figma components
  2. Sync your content with a spreadsheet to create additional sizes and image and copy variations.
  3. The plugin automatically chooses the best template to use for new creative sizes.
  4. Group your creative variations on one page or multiple.
  5. Batch rename to your output files using formulas in your spreadsheet.


Generative AI

Extend your images, remove background, or generate new images directly from Figma.


Optimised Exports

Exporting images and optimise them (both lossy and lossless mode).


Display

Export multi-frame storyboards as production ready HTML5 display banners that are ready to publish. The output files are also compatible with Google Web Designer, in-case you want to craft your animations further.

Features include:

  1. Animate and export multi-frame banner designs with one click, from Figma.
  2. Control the duration of each frame.
  3. Add intro animations to each frame.
  4. Add outro animations to each frame.
  5. Auto animate button rollovers.
  6. Control the frame animation order.


plusalso is only available to subscribers. To trial or signup for an account, contact our team at support@plusalsostudios.com.au


Support

For additional support, get in touch with us at support@plusalsostudios.com.au

Designed to seamlessly integrate with your design process, this plugin harnesses the power of AI to translate your Figma frames into over 70 languages. Localize your app icons, store page screenshots, ad creatives, and more with unparalleled ease and accuracy. Learn more


Features and Benefits:


AI-Powered Translation: Instantly translate your design elements within Figma, leveraging cutting-edge AI for accurate and context-sensitive translations.

Wide Language Support: Offering translations in over 70 languages, the Apployal Localize plugin ensures your app resonates with users worldwide.

Effortless Localization of Media Assets: Easily translate app icons, screenshots for app store pages, ad creatives, and other media directly in Figma, saving time and streamlining your workflow.

Tailored for wide users range: Whether you're a designer fine-tuning app visuals, app owner that want expand global reach, or marketer creating localized ad campaigns, this plugin simplifies your work without the need for external translation tools or services.

After translating application screenshots through the plugin, you can immediately upload the result to the App Store or Google Play in just a couple of clicks.


Get Started Today:

This plugin requires account of Apployal Localize.

plugins.name: Figma to React by Figroot
plugins.description:
Instantly turn Figma into a pixel-perfect, responsive React and Tailwind CSS website. Saves you 10x time, completely for free. This tool is intended for Design Engineers to speed up their workflow immensely.


Watch the demo video here.


Features

  1. Image download button for all images within the selection.
  2. Font support that automatically detects and adds the fonts needed.
  3. Tailwind custom config support for fonts (variables WIP).
  4. We are continuing to improve the experimental Responsive Screen setting.


How to use

  1. Click the Figma screen
  2. Copy the generated code
  3. Paste the code into page.tsx or any component your app.
  4. Paste the generated fonts and tailwind code into the corresponding files.
  5. Viola! Pixel-perfect code!


How to set up the React website

Below are the instructions to run your own React website, using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.


  1. Download Node.js (LTS) from the official website here.
  2. Next, install TypeScript using the command in your terminal: npm install -g typescript
  3. Create a Next.js app using the command in your terminal: npx create-next-app@latest
  4. Name your project your-project-name.
  5. On installation, spam enter to use the default settings for the prompts.
  6. Download Visual Studio Code here.
  7. Open Visual Studio Code, click File > Open Folder > your-project-name
  8. In the upper left, click Terminal (it could be hidden in the 3 dots), then New Terminal.
  9. In the Terminal, type npm i, then npm run dev.
  10. Hold ctrl and click the link next to Local:, should look something like: http://localhost:3000
  11. Congrats! Your Next.js app is running.
plugins.tagline: Turn Figma into a React and Tailwind CSS website for free

130671.name: Figma to React by Figroot
130671.description:
Instantly turn Figma into a pixel-perfect, responsive React and Tailwind CSS website. Saves you 10x time, completely for free. This tool is intended for Design Engineers to speed up their workflow immensely.


Watch the demo video here.


Features

  1. Image download button for all images within the selection.
  2. Font support that automatically detects and adds the fonts needed.
  3. Tailwind custom config support for fonts (variables WIP).
  4. We are continuing to improve the experimental Responsive Screen setting.


How to use

  1. Click the Figma screen
  2. Copy the generated code
  3. Paste the code into page.tsx or any component your app.
  4. Paste the generated fonts and tailwind code into the corresponding files.
  5. Viola! Pixel-perfect code!


How to set up the React website

Below are the instructions to run your own React website, using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.


  1. Download Node.js (LTS) from the official website here.
  2. Next, install TypeScript using the command in your terminal: npm install -g typescript
  3. Create a Next.js app using the command in your terminal: npx create-next-app@latest
  4. Name your project your-project-name.
  5. On installation, spam enter to use the default settings for the prompts.
  6. Download Visual Studio Code here.
  7. Open Visual Studio Code, click File > Open Folder > your-project-name
  8. In the upper left, click Terminal (it could be hidden in the 3 dots), then New Terminal.
  9. In the Terminal, type npm i, then npm run dev.
  10. Hold ctrl and click the link next to Local:, should look something like: http://localhost:3000
  11. Congrats! Your Next.js app is running.
130671.release_notes:
- Fixed variables not providing the correct code
- Fixed logo image not showing
130671.tagline: Turn Figma into a React and Tailwind CSS website for free

Function:

  1. You can select multiple objects at once.
  2. The output will have a .9 suffix added to it, And a default 1x export will be added.
  3. The generated frame position will be automatically rounded to integers to avoid pixel issues due to non-integer coordinates during image export.
  4. The generated frame will automatically include the "Clip content" option


如何使用：

1.打开插件并选择对象

2.点击按钮'创建点9'


特性：

  1. 可以同时选择多个对象进行批量处理。
  2. 输出结果将添加.9后缀和默认1x的导出设置。
  3. 生成的.9图层坐标会自动进行四舍五入取整，避免导出图片时因非整数坐标产生的像素问题。
  4. 生成的.9图层会自动添加Clip content选项

plugins.name: Smart Data
plugins.description:
Supercharge your text handling in Figma with Smart Data! This plugin gives you complete control over text manipulation with a wide variety of options. From sorting to generating random texts, injecting names, dates, Lorem Ipsum, and much more!


Features at a Glance


  1. Random Data 🎲: Inject randomly generated data based on your custom template.
  2. Repeat Data 🔁: Apply a single text template across all selected text layers.
  3. Generate Dates 🗓️: Generate sequential date-time data with your preferred format.
  4. Random Names 📛: Automatically assign random names based on different regions (US, APAC, LATAM, MEA, EU).
  5. Sequential Data 🔢: Seamlessly generate sequential alphanumeric data (`ABC`, `123`, `abc`, or custom patterns!).
  6. Randomize Predefined Data 🎯: Randomly pick data from a comma-separated list of possibilities and assign it to text layers.
  7. Sort Text 🧮: Automatically sort text either in ascending or descending orders (great for organizing items!).
  8. Lorem Ipsum Generator 📝: Quickly fill text layers with dummy content using a configurable number of words.
  9. Paste Data 📋: Easily bulk-paste excel column data into selected text layers


🚀 How To Use?


  1. Select Text Layers ( preferably on a data grid / table column ) in Figma .
  2. Launch the Plugin and choose your desired text operation.
  3. Provide any necessary input (optional, depending on the operation).
  4. Press the Change Text Button .
  5. Done! Watch as your selected text layers update in real-time.



✨ Use Cases


  1. UI Mockups : Generate placeholder texts for wireframes.
  2. Data-driven design : Quickly align number-based designs or charts.
  3. Generating form content : Design registration forms or profile pages faster with name, date, and random data generators.
  4. Consistent repetition : Apply the same text format across several elements programmatically
plugins.tagline: Supercharge your text handling in Figma with Smart Data! ✨

plugins.name: Transparency Reference Legend
plugins.description: The Transparency Reference Legend plugin for Figma is designed to help designers create a clear visual reference for color transparencies. With an intuitive interface, users can select a base color and specify the number of transparency levels to generate. The plugin then produces a series of shapes within a frame, each displaying the selected color with different transparency levels. Users have the flexibility to customize the size and spacing of the shapes, as well as choose the frame orientation (horizontal or vertical). This tool is ideal for designers who want to explore and document color transparencies in their projects, providing a useful reference legend for design consistency.
plugins.tagline: Easily Create and Display Color Transparencies with the Transparency Reference Legend

plugins.name: Layout - Tailwind CSS V4 Import & Export
plugins.description:
Layout is a powerful Figma plugin that transforms your design tokens into Tailwind CSS V4 compatible variables with just a few clicks. It creates a perfect bridge between your design system and development workflow.


Key Features:


  1. Import CSS Variables: Easily import existing CSS variables into Figma as design tokens
  2. Export to Tailwind CSS V4: Generate Tailwind CSS V4 compatible theme files from your Figma variables
  3. One-Click Tailwind Colors: Instantly add the complete Tailwind color palette to your Figma project
  4. Smart Variable Handling: Automatically processes color, typography, spacing, and shadow variables
  5. Preview Before Import: See exactly what variables will be created before importing them
  6. Intelligent Prefix Management: Automatically handles variable prefixes to ensure clean, consistent naming


Perfect For:

  1. Design teams working with developers using Tailwind CSS
  2. Creating and maintaining design systems
  3. Ensuring design-to-code consistency
  4. Streamlining the handoff process between design and development


Layout eliminates the tedious manual work of translating design tokens between Figma and code, saving you time and reducing errors. Keep your design system and code in perfect sync with this essential tool for modern design workflows.
plugins.tagline: Bridge Figma design tokens to the Tailwind CSS V4 config for perfect design-to-code harmony

plugins.name: ColorCheck WCAG
plugins.description:
ColorCheck WCAG es un plugin minimalista y funcional diseñado para facilitar a diseñadores y desarrolladores la verificación de contrastes de colores de acuerdo con las pautas WCAG. Esta herramienta MVP te permite probar combinaciones de colores de fondo y texto para garantizar accesibilidad y cumplir con estándares de diseño inclusivo.


Características Clave

  1. ✅ Cálculo de Índice de Contraste: Evalúa rápidamente los niveles A, AA y AAA de contraste según WCAG 2.1.
  2. 🎨 Selector de Colores Intuitivo: Configura fácilmente el color de fondo y texto con selectores HEX y visores dinámicos.
  3. 💡 Resultados Claros: Obtén información inmediata sobre el cumplimiento de cada nivel con una interfaz limpia y amigable.


¿Cómo Funciona?

  1. Selecciona tus colores: Ingresa o selecciona un color de fondo y un color de texto desde el selector integrado.
  2. Revisa el contraste: Visualiza el índice de contraste y verifica si cumple con los niveles A, AA o AAA de accesibilidad.
  3. Itera tus combinaciones: Ajusta colores para lograr resultados óptimos en segundos.


🚀 Tu Feedback es Importante

ColorCheck WCAG es un MVP en constante evolución, ¡quiero saber qué necesitas! ¿Qué funcionalidades adicionales te gustaría ver? Deja tus comentarios y recomendaciones para ayudarme a mejorar en las próximas versiones.
plugins.tagline: ColorCheck WCAG: Optimiza la accesibilidad de colores para experiencias inclusivas y efectivas.

plugins.name: Copy & Flatten
plugins.description: This plugin enhances design efficiency by duplicating selected components or instances and transforming their first child element into a single vector element. The plugin sets the constraints of this flattened element to “scale” and renames it to “Vector”. The duplicate is then converted into a new component, retaining the original name.
plugins.tagline: Duplicates containers and flattens their child elements into single vectors

plugins.name: Components Manager
plugins.description:
Features


- List all Components in the document

- List the corresponding Variants in the document

- Quickly navigate to a Component or Variant by clicking in the list

- Show amount of instances of a Component or Variant in the document

- Automatic refresh when the document changes

- List all Instances of a Component or Variant in the document

- Search through all Components, Variants and Instances
plugins.tagline: Get an overview of the Components and Variants in your document.

plugins.name: Digital Wellbeing Lens
plugins.description:
Plugin made for research purposes at Politecnico di Torino.


This plugin helps to design better applications relatively to digital wellbeing.


How to use it:

  1. Open the plugin and insert your OpenAI API key.
  2. Select one or multiple designed screen and click on "Scan" to receive the report for each screen, which consists on the list of detected design patterns relevant for digital wellbeing.
  3. Flag a design pattern as incorrectly detected if you think the system is wrong.
  4. Try to use the suggested solutions present in the report to correct your design, and when you feel satisfied run a new scan.
  5. Re-iterate whenever you feel like you need some suggestions on how much you are aligned with digital wellbeing design guidelines.
plugins.tagline: Check your design for patterns damaging to digital wellbeing

plugins.name: Rename_Picker
plugins.description:
Rename all the components in a frame following a numerical order, according to their position in the frame. The order starts from left to right, and top to bottom.

The new name follows the structure "FRAME_NAME.XX" XX=number, starting from 00.
plugins.tagline: Numerically rename components in a frame
